what's new http://unity3d.com/unity/whats-new/unity-4.3.4
[code]System Requirements for Unity development

Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Windows XP SP2 or later; Windows 7 SP1; Mac OS X "Snow Leopard" 10.6 or later. Note that Unity was not tested on server versions of Windows and OS X.
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Graphics card with DirectX 9 level (shader model 2.0) capabilities. Any card made since 2004 should work.
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Using Occlusion Culling requires GPU with Occlusion Query support (some Intel GPUs do not support that).

System Requirements for Unity iOS development
In addition to the general system requirements:
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Only Unity OS X version supports iOS as build platform
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Xcode 4.3

System Requirements for Unity Android development
In addition to the general system requirements:
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Android SDK and Java Development Kit (JDK)
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Android authored content requires devices equipped with:
o Android OS 2.3.1 or later
o Device powered by an ARMv7 (Cortex family) CPU
o GPU support for OpenGLES 2.0 is recommended

System Requirements for Windows Store/Windows Phone development
In addition to the general system requirements:
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Windows Phone SDK 8.0 requires 64-bit Windows 8 Pro or higher. You can't develop Windows Phone 8 apps on Windows 7, on Windows Server 2008, or on Windows Server 2012.
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Microsoft Visual Studio 2012

System Requirements for Unity BlackBerry development
In addition to the general system requirements:
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Requires installation of Java 32-bit runtime
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ BlackBerry authored content requires devices equipped with BlackBerry OS 10 or later

System Requirements for Unity-made Content

Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Windows XP or later; Mac OS X 10.5 or later.
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Pretty much any 3D graphics card, depending on complexity.
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Online games run on all browsers, including IE, Firefox, Safari, and Chrome, among others.[/code]
